thread.title: Did Bruno Tonioli just swear on live TV during Strictly Come Dancing?
thread.title_full: Did Bruno Tonioli just swear on live TV during Strictly Come Dancing?

title: Did Bruno Tonioli just swear on live TV during Strictly Come Dancing?
text:
Did Bruno Tonioli just swear on live TV during Strictly Come Dancing? Did Bruno Tonioli just swear on live TV during Strictly Come Dancing? Share 
Strictly Come Dancing was forced to apologise after judge Bruno Tonioli swore on live television. 
He described pop star Jay McGuiness’s Paso as the “bull’s b s” on tonight’s show. Jay McGuiness and Aliona Vilani (Guy Levy/BBC) 
Hostess Tess Daly immediately apologised on air. Don't think Bruno even realised that he had used a swear word. Brilliant. #strictly 
— Amanda Cook (@cookiebird) October 24, 2015 Bruno said a swear word… Bruno said a swear word.. #Strictly 
— kelli packham (@KelliPacham) October 24, 2015 
Strictly later said sorry “for any offence caused by Bruno’s comment during the live show”. We are sorry for any offence caused by Bruno's comment during the live show, for which Tess apologized immediately. 
— BBC Strictly (@bbcstrictly) October 24, 2015 
The Wanted singer and partner Aliona Vilani scored a total of 33 for their performance. 
Call the Midwife actress Helen George and EastEnders star Kellie Bright are at the top of the leaderboard. Helen George and Aljaz Skorjanec (Guy Levy/BBC) 
George and partner Aljaz Skorjanec wowed judges with their Quickstep to Diana Ross and the Supremes’ You Can’t Hurry Love. 
Judge Craig Revel Horwood described it as “fabulous”. 
Kellie and Kevin Clifton impressed the judges with their Jive to a One Direction cover of One Way Or Another. Judges Craig Revel Horwood, Darcey Bussell, Len Goodman and Bruno Tonioli (Guy Levy/BBC) 
Judge Len Goodman quipped that he wanted the clocks to go back so he could see it again. 
BBC News presenter Jeremy Vine is at the bottom of the leaderboard again, a spot he shares with Radio 3′s Katie Derham. Share article 
The Strictly Come Dancing results show airs on Sunday at 7.15pm. Promoted Stories
